joyful.title: The Annunciation
joyful.meditationGuidance: Reflect on Mary’s ‘yes’ at the angel’s announcement.

sorrowful.title: The Agony in the Garden
sorrowful.meditationGuidance: Consider Jesus’ trust in the Father amid suffering.

glorious.title: The Resurrection
glorious.meditationGuidance: Rejoice in Christ’s victory over death.

luminous.title: The Baptism in the Jordan
luminous.meditationGuidance: Contemplate the revelation of the Trinity.
